title: AFK in RANK GAMES
body: Riot, the game is approaching season 8 and yet there is no practical solution to punishing players going afk during rank games. Although they might get banned afterwards through the report system (hardly), the players on the afker's team suffer a full lp lost. This is extremely unfair and obviously needs to be dealt with heading into the end of season 7.

replies.body:
Theres a mod saying thats ok here, careful man.

Also, while i agree that unfair theres not much that can be done about it (and i agree, should be looked at). 
out of humor, how would you fix it and implement said fix?
